feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-08-24T05:53:08.650452Z; ; ; <作者>; <名称>;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;时间在早期宇宙中运行缓慢，正如爱因斯坦预测的那样</stitle>; <id>;https://www.advancedsciencenews.com/time-ran-slowly-in-the- Early-universe-just-as-einstein-predicted/</id>; <更新>;2023-08-24T02:52:35.857364Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.advancedsciencenews.com/time- ran-slowly-in-the-early-universe-just-as-einstein-predicted/"/>; <author>; <name>;geox</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =geox</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.advancedsciencenews.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/daniele-levis-pelusi-rmM8V7L1BhM -unsplash.jpg" style="宽度: 220px; height: 123px;" />;<br />;科学家发现，大爆炸后时间的流逝速度慢了五倍，证实了爱因斯坦的预测。研究人员利用类星体作为宇宙钟，观察到了早期宇宙的时间膨胀，表明时间是相对的到宇宙的年龄。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#time-ran-slowly-in-the-early-universe-just-as-einstein-predicted" target="_blank" >;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37214693" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;AI实时人体全身照片生成器</stitle>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://static. generated.photos/vue-static/ human-generator/opengraph.png" style="width: 220px; height: 115px;" />;<br />;利用AI在线生成不存在的人物，更换服装并修改面部和身体特征。下载生成的不同姿势的人物。 <a href="https://hackernews. betacat.io/#ai-real-time- human-full-body-photo-generator" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <id>;https:// /attainablefelicity.mattkirkland.com/20230822/Sketchbooks.html</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T19:52:36.054862Z</更新>; <link href="https://attainablefelicity.mattkirkland.com/20230822/ Sketchbooks.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;matt_kirkland </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=matt_kirkland</uri>; </author>; <content type="html" >;<img src="https://attainablefelicity.mattkirkland.com/assets/2023sketchbooks/stack.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 208px;" />;<br />;我从 2000 年开始就一直保留一本素描本。它已经成为我更好地处理和记忆事物的笔记本。它帮助我思考、计划和改进我的想法。<a href= “https://hackernews.betacat.io/#on-keeping-sketchbooks” target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 37227606" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;Windows 2.0 的历史</stitle>; <id>;https://www.abortretry.fail/p/the-history-of-windows-20</id>; <updated>;2023-08-23T22:52 ：36.055677Z </更新>; <link href="https://www.abortretry.fail/p/the-history-of-windows-20"/>; <作者>; <名称>;jnord </名称>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jnord</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456, c_limit、f_auto、q_auto：好、fl_progressive：陡峭/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F259e9ceb-cad8-4302-9db8-b6e22abd1ac2_640x350.png" style="width ：220像素； height: 121px;" />;<br />;Windows 1.0 发布后，Tandy Trower 用了 18 个月的时间开发 Windows 2.0。他添加了重叠窗口和比例系统字体等功能。Windows 2.0 于 1987 年发布，并得到了改进UI 和硬件支持。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-history-of-windows-2-0" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37216455" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;SeaGlass：全市 IMSI-Catcher 检测 (2017)</stitle>; <id>;https://seaglass.cs.washington.edu/ </id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T16:52:36.056706Z</更新>; <link href="https://seaglass.cs.washington.edu/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;karlzt</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=karlzt</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://seaglass-web.s3 .amazonaws.com/wp-content/uploads/sensor_triplet.png" style="width: 220px; height: 188px;" />;<br />;SeaGlass 是一个旨在测量整个城市 IMSI 捕获器使用情况的系统。它收集手机信号塔信号数据以检测 IMSI 捕获器签名。<a href="https://hackernews. betacat.io/#seaglass-city-wide-imsi-catcher-detection-2017" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id =37238254" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type= “text">;Bun v0.8</stitle>; <id>;https://bun.sh/blog/bun-v0.8.0</id>; <更新>;2023-08-24T01:52:36.057873Z</更新>; <link href="https://bun.sh/blog/bun-v0.8.0"/>; <作者>; <name>;todsacerdoti</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://github-production-user-asset-6210df.s3.amazonaws.com/3084745/261513717-3b69c7e9- 25ff-4f9d-acc4-caa736862935.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 125px;" />;<br />;Bun v0.8.0 添加了调试器支持，实现了获取流，并解锁了 SvelteKit。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#bun-v0-8" target ="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37244012" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：Dataherald AI – 自然语言到 SQL 引擎</stitle>; < id>;https://github.com/Dataherald/dataherald</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T18:52:36.059175Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/Dataherald/dataherald "/>; <author>; <name>;aazo11</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=aazo11</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src =“https://opengraph.githubassets.com/86d198e2c46041f3f7c5c5307c86e169534f40104c6d8682e17188a6266d85fa/Dataherald/dataherald”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;Dataherald 是一种自然语言到 SQL 的引擎，专为针对结构化数据进行企业级问答而构建。它允许您从数据库设置一个 API，该 API 可以用简单的英语回答问题. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-dataherald-ai-natural-language-to-sql-engine" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37240363" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// /hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;反对自动性</stitle>; <id>;https://carcinising.com/2023/08/22/against-automaticity/</id >; <更新>;2023-08-23T20:52:36.059872Z</更新>; <link href="https://carcinising.com/2023/08/22/against-automaticity/"/>; <作者>; <名称>; simonsarris</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=simonsarris</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://carcinitation. files.wordpress.com/2023/08/image.png?w=906" style="width: 220px; height: 228px;" />;<br />;广告以两种无聊的方式发挥作用，提醒顾客产品的存在，并以更心理的方式，在产品和积极情绪之间建立联系。理性主义社区挑战自动性的想法，并认为：人类行为比以前认为的更加理性。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#against-automaticity" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https:/ /news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37226879" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Pytudes</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/norvig/pytudes</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T20:52:36.060640Z </更新>; <link href="https://github.com/norvig/pytudes"/>; <作者>; <name>;sonabinu</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =sonabinu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/8b72c4a4686ce60f31f2c378093e5382bcd953e3510cdb6510b33a8877acb39a/68747470733a2f2f696d616765 732d6e612e73736c2d696d616765732d616d617a6f6e2e636f6d2f696d616765732f492f35315a6e5a48323964764c2e5f53583339345f424f312c32303 42c3230332c3230305f2e6a7067”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 278px;" />;<br />;练习曲是一种器乐作品，旨在为完善特定的音乐技能提供练习材料。有些人想到像 Spotify 这样的编程，他们想知道如何安装该应用程序，找到一个好的播放列表，然后点击播放按钮；之后，他们就不想再考虑它了。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#pytudes" target="_blank">;[summary]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37241625" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Nvidia 公布 2024 财年第二季度财务业绩</stitle>; <id>;https://nvidianews.nvidia.com /news/nvidia-announces-financial-results-for-second-quarter-fiscal-2024</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T20:52:36.061550Z</更新>; <link href="https:// nvidianews.nvidia.com/news/nvidia-announces-financial-results-for-second-quarter-fiscal-2024"/>; <作者>; <名称>;electriclove</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=electriclove</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.nvidia.com/content/dam/en-zz/Solutions/navigation/智能机器.png" style="width: 220px; height: 125px;" />;<br />;NVIDIA公布第二季度营收为135.1亿美元，同比增长101%。该公司还宣布了在人工智能和游戏领域的合作伙伴关系和新产品。 <a href=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/#nvidia-announces-financial-results-for-second-quarter-fiscal-2024" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// /news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37241487" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;英国核潜艇上的生活（2012）</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theguardian.com/uk/2012/aug/21/life -on-board-nuclear-submarine</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T20:52:36.062866Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.theguardian.com/uk/2012/aug/ 21/life-on-board-nuclear-submarine"/>; <author>; <name>;whocansay</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=whocansay</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/static/sys-images/Guardian/About/General/2012/8/21/1345564538828/HMS-凯旋-cramped-cond-010.jpg?width=445&dpr=1&s=none" style="width: 220px; height: 132px;" />;<br />;描述了英国核潜艇上的生活，以及执行官和船员的见解。文章强调了对新人的实际指导、船员之间的友情和责任与船上操作核反应堆有关。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#life-on-board-a-british-nuclear-submarine-2012" target="_blank">;[summary] </a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37241601" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml: base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;新闻的粉丝化</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theverge.com/23836187/gen -z-news-creator-source-tiktok-instagram-lil-tay</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T23:52:36.064672Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.theverge. com/23836187/gen-z-news-creator-commerce-tiktok-instagram-lil-tay"/>; <author>; <name>;xingyzt</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=xingyzt</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://duet-cdn.vox-cdn.com/thumbor/0x0:2382x1339/2400x2400/filters:focal( 1222x526:1223x527):格式(webp)/cdn.vox-cdn.com/uploads/chorus_asset/file/24856993/Screenshot_2023_08_17_at_2.44.31_PM.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;年轻一代希望新闻直接来自创作者。但当创作者犯错时，新闻生态系统很快就会崩溃。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/# the-fandomization-of-news" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37216424" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;打印(“lol”) 加倍我的 Go 函数的速度</stitle>; <id>;https://medium.com/@ludirehak/printing-lol-doubled-the-speed-of-my-go-code-e32e02fc3f92</id>; <updated>; 2023-08-24T03:52:36.066318Z</更新>; <link href="https://medium.com/@ludirehak/printing-lol-doubled-the-speed-of-my-go-code-e32e02fc3f92" />; <作者>; <名称>;ludiludi</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ludiludi</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src ="https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:1358/1*nAyhwGzJghFJRfFm5pykYA.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 204px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了在 Go 函数中添加 print 语句的影响以及它如何影响分支预测。它表明分支预测有效地去除了 if 语句并提高了性能。<a href ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#print-lol-doubled-the-speed-of-my-go-function" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https ://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37244503" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;在 macOS ARM64 上探索 Windows XP</stitle>; <id>;https://milen.me/writings/exploring-windows-xp-on-macos-arm64 /</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T16:52:36.066946Z</更新>; <link href="https://milen.me/writings/exploring-windows-xp-on-macos-arm64/" />; <author>; <name>;milen</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=milen</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src =“https://r2-cloudflare.milen.me/images/writings/windows-xp-on-macos-arm64/setup_06.jpg”样式=“宽度：220px； height: 185px;" />;<br />;使用QEMU可以在ARM64 Mac上运行Windows XP。作者安装了XP和各种经典软件，用截图记录了过程。<a href="https://hackernews .betacat.io/#exploring-windows-xp-on-macos-arm64" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 37238306" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;薪资谈判中的常见错误</stitle>; <id>;https://interviewing.io/blog/sabotage-salary-negotiation-before-even-start</id>; <updated>;2023-08-23T18:52 ：36.067578Z </更新>; <link href="https://interviewing.io/blog/sabotage-salary-negotiation-before-even-start"/>; <作者>; <名称>;eamonnm </名称>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=eamonnm</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://interviewing.io/static/images/FooterImg. png" 样式="宽度:220px; height: 178px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了人们在开始使用谈判服务之前在薪资谈判中常犯的两个错误。它强调了与招聘人员交谈时处于“被动信息收集”模式的重要性并强调了候选人和招聘人员之间的利益不一致。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#common-mistakes-in-salary-negotiation" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37239747" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;普林斯顿“AI 蛇油”作者称 GenAI 炒作已“失控”</stitle>; <id>;https:// Venturebeat.com/ai/princeton-university-ai-snake-oil-professors-say-generative-ai-hype-has-spiraled-out-of-control/</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T23:52 ：36.068225Z</更新>; <link href="https://venturebeat.com/ai/princeton-university-ai-snake-oil-professors-say-generative-ai-hype-has-spiraled-out-of- control/"/>; <author>; <name>;CharlesW</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=CharlesW</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <img src="https://venturebeat.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/AI-7.png?fit=750%2C469&strip=all" style="width: 220px; height: 138px;" />;<br />;普林斯顿大学的 Arvind Narayanan 和 Sayash Kapoor，《AI Snake Oil》一书的作者，讨论了他们对 AI 观点的演变以及对负责任技术的需求。他们强调预测与预测之间的区别人工智能和生成式人工智能，以及解决与生成式人工智能相关的炒作和风险的重要性。它们还强调了使用透明度和政策变化的必要性，以确保人工智能开发和使用中的道德实践。<a href="https:/ /hackernews.betacat.io/#princeton-ai-snake-oil-authors-say-genai-hype-has-spiraled-out-of-control" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37243354" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;PreTeXt：一次编写，随处阅读的创作和发布系统</stitle>; <id>;https://pretextbook.org/</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T19:52:36.069007Z</updated>; <link href="https://pretextbook.org/"/>; <author>; <name>;teleforce</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=teleforce</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://pretextbook.org/images/runestone_logo_small.png" style="width: 220 像素； height: 220px;" />;<br />;PreTeXt 是一个为教科书、研究文章和专着作者（特别是 STEM 学科）的作者提供的创作和出版系统。它提供了一系列功能并支持不同的主题。该系统具有全面的文档以及针对作者、出版商、读者和开发人员的支持论坛。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#pretext-write-once-read-anywhere-authoring-and-publishing-system" target= "_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37231025" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; < /entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;将 Web 组件用于其擅长的领域</stitle>; <id>; https://nolanlawson.com/2023/08/23/use-web-components-for-what-theyre-good-at/</id>; <更新>;2023-08-24T00:52:36.069746Z</更新>; <link href="https://nolanlawson.com/2023/08/23/use-web-components-for-what-theyre-good-at/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;chriskrycho</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=chriskrycho</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://nolanwlawson.files.wordpress.com /2023/08/logo.png?w=570" style="宽度: 220px; height: 146px;" />;<br />;Web 组件有优点和缺点，了解权衡很重要。当组件不需要服务器端渲染、不插入任何内容并且易于集成。由于稳定性和寿命长，它们在大型企业中也很受欢迎。但是，Web 组件在服务器端渲染、可访问性、锁定、遗留支持和平台耗尽方面存在弱点。<a href="https:// /hackernews.betacat.io/#use-web-components-for-what-theyre-good-at" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator. com/item?id=37243751" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;HashiCorp 切换到 BSL 显示了对开放特许公司的需求</stitle>; <id>;https://opencoreventures.com/blog/2023-08-23-hashicorp-switching-bsl-shows -need-for-open-charter-companies/</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T18:52:36.070418Z</更新>; <link href="https://opencoreventures.com/blog/2023-08 -23-hashicorp-switching-bsl-shows-need-for-open-charter-companies/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;sytse</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=sytse</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opencoreventures.com/blog/2023-08-23-hashicorp-switching-bsl-shows-need- for-open-charter-companies/avg-time-ipo-switch.png" style="width: 220px; height: 137px;" />;<br />;HashiCorp 是最新一家从开源转向非竞争许可的公司，追随知名开源公司的趋势。这种趋势引起了对商业开源软件的不信任社区呼吁公司通过开放章程承担责任。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hashicorp-switching-to-bsl-shows-a-need-for-open- Charter-companies" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37239979" target="_blank">;[评论]</a >;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;基于 Spotify 播放列表的编程语言的解释器< /stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/h313/spet</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T19:52:36.071212Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com /h313/spet"/>; <作者>; <名称>;pyinstallwoes</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pyinstallwoes</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/f3c58e2bfa4da290538a73694d800f0ea73e71ddd172a2b1af87abcccb46bc99/h313/spet" style="宽度：220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;Spet 是基于 Spotify 播放列表的编程语言的解释器。它从上到下读取播放列表，并使用歌曲的各种属性来定义行为。该解释器需要 Spotify 高级帐户连接 API。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#an-interpreter-for-a-programming-language-based-on-spotify-playlists" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37231347" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：Gentrace – 生成式 AI 的评估和可观察性</stitle>; <id>;https://gentrace .ai</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T16:52:36.072006Z</更新>; <link href="https://gentrace.ai"/>; <作者>; <名称>;dsaffy</名称>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dsaffy</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://gentrace.ai/_next/image? url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fss-6.6bf15347.png&w=3840&q=75" style="宽度：220px; height: 115px;" />;<br />;停止在电子表格中使用人类。使用人工智能和启发式评估器自动评估回归和幻觉。监控生产中的速度和成本。深入查看输入、输出和评估器分数特定世代。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-gentrace-evaluation-and-observability-for-generative-ai" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; </content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;计数的早期历史</stitle>; <id>; https://www.laphamsquarterly.org/roundtable/early-history-counting</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T19:52:36.073759Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.laphamsquarterly .org/roundtable/early-history-counting"/>; <作者>; <名称>;anarbadalov </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=anarbadalov </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.laphamsquarterly.org/sites/default/files/images/roundtable/counting_lead_v1.jpg" style="width: 220px;高度：269px;" />;<br />;弄清楚人类何时开始有目的地系统地计数并不容易。我们第一个真正的线索是一些奇怪的雕刻骨头，可以追溯到三千年的最后几千年-​旧石器时代或旧石器时代的百万年范围。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-early-history-of-counting" target="_blank">;[摘要] </a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37240681" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml: base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;第一个符合标准的 M1 GPU 驱动程序</stitle>; <id>;https://rosenzweig.io/blog/first -conformant-m1-gpu-driver.html</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T05:52:36.076382Z</更新>; <link href="https://rosenzweig.io/blog/first-conformant- m1-gpu-driver.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;todsacerdoti </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti </uri>; </作者>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://rosenzweig.io/blog/vkinstancing2.webp" style="宽度：220px; height: 119px;" />;<br />;符合 OpenGL ES 3.1 的驱动程序现已适用于 M1 和 M2 系列 GPU。我们的逆向工程、免费和开源图形驱动程序是世界上唯一适用于 M1 的符合 OpenGL ES 3.1 实现- 和 M2 系列图形硬件。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-first-conformant-m1-gpu-driver" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37224042" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;2022 年 SPAC 合并的回报中位数：-82%</stitle>; <id>;https://pranshum.yarn.tech/24dade67 -68e3-4e18-b597-94acfab46a61</id>; <更新>;2023-08-24T00:52:36.076960Z</更新>; <link href="https://pranshum.yarn.tech/24dade67-68e3-4e18- b597-94acfab46a61"/>; <作者>; <名称>;pranshum</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pranshum</uri>; </author>; <content type="html" >; 2022 年的泡沫时期，有 94 家 SPAC 与私营公司合并，但回报率极低。 MLTX（MoonLakeImmunotherapeutics）是个例外，由于积极的临床试验结果，其股价上涨了 464%。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-median-return-of-2022-s-spac-mergers-82" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37243527" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;ChatGPT 将生成式 AI 变成了“任何工具”</stitle>; <id>;https://arstechnica.com/ai/2023/08/ how-chatgpt-turned-generative-ai-into-an-anything-tool/</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T14:52:36.077521Z</更新>; <link href="https://arstechnica. com/ai/2023/08/how-chatgpt-turned-generative-ai-into-an-anything-tool/"/>; <author>; <name>;CharlesW</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=CharlesW</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.arstechnica.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/chatgpt -anything-tool-800x450.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;像 ChatGPT 这样的生成式人工智能模型已经成为强大的通用信息处理工具，无需经过专门培训即可用于各个领域。这些模型是概率性的，通过预测给定输入的单词和短语的概率来工作。虽然它们可能是不可预测的，但它们提供了传统基于规则的系统所缺乏的灵活性和功能。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#chatgpt-turned-generative-ai-into-an-anything-tool" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37236027" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
